name: THE FASTEST DATING SIM EVER
description:
Entry for the 20-second Game Jam.

HEY THERE!

You want Boys? We got Boys!

Date 4 (four) very unique, very stand-out, very interesting Boys!

Trust us, you'll love them. We're Boy Experts, we would know.

Features:

  • 250~ words, 4 different endings, and 20 seconds to read!
  • Customized UI and menu
  • Playable in-browser

Art and writing all produced by me, ZenithZyie: My Twitter here.

Music attribution here.
